body:
Hello. I am a YouTuber. Well, kind of :3
I really enjoy making the content itself - after getting a comfortable recording program (does not lag the gameplay/produces great quality video files) I have found that making videos is a billion times easier. However, I think the most important and the most enjoyable part about being a YouTuber is reading all the comments and looking through the feedback that people give you. Sure, h8ers gonna h8, but it's the nice comments and the constructive criticism that really do bring you up and encourage you to make more content.
Post your thoughts and what you think is the most enjoyable part of being a YouTuber!

Also, I have two "friends" who constantly dislike my new videos. xD
And you don't have to comment if you're not a YouTuber :3
body_tagged:

title: Most Enjoyable Part of being a YouTuber?

replies.body:
Well I love recording but if I didn't have a crapbook "pro" and a better computer it wouldn't be lagicon 2014 every time i try to record.
But on the side note, I completely agree with you.
replies.body_tagged:
Well I love recording but if I didn't have a crapbook "pro" and a better computer it wouldn't be lagicon 2014 every time i try to record.
But on the side note, I completely agree with you.

replies.body: The best part is getting back feedback, and knowing that someone is enjoying what you're producing. It's great to see the support, and the things people would do for you in return!
replies.body_tagged: The best part is getting back feedback, and knowing that someone is enjoying what you're producing. It's great to see the support, and the things people would do for you in return!

replies.body: seeing feedback and working with other people is just a blast. Also want to record together?
replies.body_tagged: seeing feedback and working with other people is just a blast. Also want to record together?

replies.body: Cin I had 12 friends that disliked my video...... I cri
replies.body_tagged: Cin I had 12 friends that disliked my video...... I cri

replies.body: I enjoy being able to record videos and actually seeing 40+ plus views on it! I just sit back and think  wow 40 people have watched my video. One thing is dislike it me not having all the time in the world to be able to record videos and edit and upload them.
replies.body_tagged: I enjoy being able to record videos and actually seeing 40+ plus views on it! I just sit back and think  wow 40 people have watched my video. One thing is dislike it me not having all the time in the world to be able to record videos and edit and upload them.

replies.body: I enjoy the making, knowing you've recorded funny stuff that viewers are gonna love ^_^
replies.body_tagged: I enjoy the making, knowing you've recorded funny stuff that viewers are gonna love ^_^

replies.body: I have 77 subscribers (that don't really watch), but it is very fun to freestyle video edit and do all kinds of motion graphic designing stuff. At 13 years old, it is fantastic! I get like 5 more years to f*ck around with the creation of videos.

replies.body: it is really fun being one i hav 400+ views and 20 subs XDDDD
replies.body_tagged: it is really fun being one i hav 400+ views and 20 subs XDDDD

replies.body:
I love recording the videos. It makes it even more fun when you are with friends, and just having a great time doing so! 
Also, I love getting feedback and comments from the people who watch my videos.
That is what keeps me going in YouTube; the fact that people actually enjoy what I do!

replies.body: Oh and cinammon, which recording software you do use?

replies.body:
I recently hit 100 subs.
joined a game of oc.tc and some people freaked over me.
it was the most humbling thing to ever happen to me, that I join and people are like "I love you" and "OMG it's you"
